Detailed Description

Special stringstream for creating SQL queries.

Overrides stringstream for MC2Strings and includes ' around MC2Strings and converts uint8 to uint32 before adding. All other types are streamed as normal. Usage: 

 SQL::StringStream str;
 MC2String astring("hello");
 uint8 value = 8;
 str << 1023 << ", " << astring << ", " << value;
 cout << str;
 // outputs:
 // 1023, 'hello', 8
